summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Baniya.ai MVP - all core features working perfectly. Backend APIs (100% success rate), frontend UI/UX, navigation, and Gemini AI integration all functional.
passed_tests: CC Helper recommendations with valid spending profiles
CC Helper handling empty/zero spending profiles
Q-Commerce screenshot analysis using Gemini 2.5 Flash
Sales predictions endpoint with full data
Shaadi Fund GET endpoint returning current balance
Shaadi Fund ADD endpoint updating balance correctly
Homepage loading with hero section and features grid
Navigation between all pages (Home, CC Helper, Q-Commerce, Sales Navigator)
CC Helper form accepting inputs and displaying recommendations
Q-Commerce image upload, preview, and AI analysis workflow
Sales Navigator timeline display with filtering
Shaadi Fund tracker showing updated balance from backend
Neo-Brutalist design elements (shadows, fonts, colors) properly implemented
Real-time integration between frontend and backend APIs
